infobox.Japanese title:: 灰原を狙うカメラ  (Haibara o Nerau Kamera)

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Toshimitsu Oda as Man in black suit A  Sadao Nunome as Man in the black suit B  Daisuke Takahashi as Kanoya  Aya Gomazuru as Harano  Ikuji Nose as Narration

sections.Situation: Conan and Haibara were invited to Beika Department Store by the Detective Boys. The aim is the first prize of the lottery held at the bargain venue "Hachijo-jima Whale Watching Tour". Haibara is asked by the doctor to withdraw some cash while she's at it, and heads to the bank's ATM branch. However, just before that, Kogoro's cash card was swallowed by the machine and did not return. When he is about to go to another branch, he sees a suspicious man in a black suit. The man who noticed Haibara had a surprised expression on his face.
sections.People:
- Suspicious man in black suit

sections.Trivia:
- The delivery brand "Konozama" is in fact "Amazon".
- Tohto Meiwa Bank reappears in Stakeout 2.
